website_summaries.verdict: For unceasing comfort that can be worn in and out of your home, these sneakers are tops. Howser II shoes provide the right amount of support, are cozily warm, and have very grippy soles. The materials are quite durable yet light.There are only two things that take away from these sneakers being perfect. For one, these shoes run small, and second, the shoes’ back rubs on the heels. Both are fixed easily enough. A size adjustment should suffice while thin socks should stop the shoes from rubbing too much.
pros: Nearly all reviewers raved about how comfortable Keen Howser II shoes are
One person likened wearing the sneakers to walking on clouds while another claimed the shoes are good for people with heel spurs and plantar fasciitis
Plenty of users loved the warmth of these kicks
They described the shoes as being cozy toasty but not hot
According to a lot of testers, these low-top sneakers provide great foot and arch support whether you’re walking or standing up
The Keen Howser II sneakers were commended by several purchasers for being extremely versatile
They mentioned that these work well whether used as house shoes or outdoor wear
The low-top kicks are water-resistant, reported a good number of buyers, which makes these footwear perfect for daily outdoor use during the winter
The style of the Howser II is quite fashion-forward
These shoes have gotten their owners plenty of compliments from strangers and friends
Some consumers mentioned how sturdy their Howser II shoes were
A handful of customers remarked how much they liked the colors of these Keen sneakers
These are light and slip-resistant sneakers as noted by a few buyers
cons: The Keen Howser II silhouette runs small according to several customers
The back of these low-cut sneakers rubs slightly on the heels, a few people reported

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Tried many brands of slippers, L.L. Bean (no half-sizes and paid to return them and showed up late both deliveries), L.B Evans, Slippers international, Bearpaw, Minnetonka etc. While almost impossible to get anything made in the USA these were the most comfortable. Not a lot of arch support but had room to add cushy insoles and are now soooo comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: Another great Keen shoe-reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. In part because the last is perfect for me ; wide forefoot, narrow heel. But in addition, the materials and workmanship is first rate and at a good price. Reminds me of the old new balance products when their quality was first rate. And the choice of styles is amazing. I hope they make a million dollars.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but just not sized right
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son. He wears a size 8-81⁄2 wide shoe. These didn't come in wide so I ordered a 9 regular which usually fit fine and being a house shoe they usually give a bit. Not these, they were very tight and way too long. They are a very nice shoe and well made, which is why I gave them the 3 stars but they just weren't a good fit. They will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: Make them x-tra wide!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a pair of these from 4 years ago. They were then made in x-tra wide width. He can not get the new ones on. Wish he could still get the wider size.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: 6.5 months per pair
customer_reviews.text: Based on 4 pairs, these last 6.5 months: 5 in winter. Most often they fray at thread seems near the outside of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Shishin Junsei Benn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great slippers...by far the nicest pair I have ever owned. Its like these slippers hug my feet every time I wear them. The materuals on the i side keep my feet nice and warm withkut getting all sweaty. The opening of the shoes are alittle snug but nothing that bugs me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a Christmas gift to replace an older pair that had worn out. There was one small cosmetic issue on the same part of each shoe that did not diminish the comfort or functionality of the shoes, but when brought to the attention of Keen customer service under the one year warranty, Keen went above and beyond to resolve the issue to my complete satisfaction. The shoes are great and Keen customer service is as good as their shoes. Thanks, Keen!
customer_reviews.author: Glen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and off. Nice to have the rubber sole for going outside. Recipient likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow and tight. I usually wear a women's size 12 but Keen doesn't make women's in size 12. I usually have success buying men's size 10, but these were super narrow, and the stiff insulation-like outer shell meant there was NO chance they would loosen up. Disappointed cause the insole was great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: Use them for slippers. Live in the snowy UP wonderland and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Laksonen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: After the first month of wearing these, I would have given them 4 stars because the edge around the ankle was pretty stiff and would dig into my ankle. I couldn't wear them very long. Now, after the initial break-in period, these are great! The edge has softened a bit to make this a very comfortable slipper. I wear them all the time now. If you're looking for an all weather slipper, these are them.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great item, my husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Great item, my husband loves them...but it took 2 months to get them (for them to arrive). They were apparently backordered & we were not aware when we placed the order.
customer_reviews.author: HLM

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks good but way smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I know Keens seem to run a little small, so I ordered a size up, but even so this was too tight to wear barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Run small, Do not breath
customer_reviews.text: they do run small, get at least 1 size bigger. they do not breath, so your feet will sweat. but your feet will stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: PawD

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A little more sturdy than previous pairs. This is my 3rd pair over many years. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kib Reed

customer_reviews.title: I wear orthotics during my work day.  The footbed in these slippers are perfect for around house
customer_reviews.text: Will not own another slipper. I wore a pair out in about 4 years. A bit spendy for a pair of slippers, but whattya gonna do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These r great shoes, our 4 pair in 15 years...we love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: freedom

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, great indoors and good outdoors. insole seems like it will break down soon, which is why I did not give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: paul villeneuve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Going on my 4th pair!! Cant say enough.
customer_reviews.author: spinningsports2

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all for a high instep!
customer_reviews.text: I previously ordered these in the women's version in my regular Keen size. . I have a high instep and although they were the right length, I couldn't remotely get them on. I decided to try again, and ordered a larger men's size, thinking it might fit better. It has exactly the same problem. I love Keens, but will not ever be ordering the Howser again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Strange

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers..
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love keen and have a pair of the houser slippers....love em....love em so much attempted to purchase a these for my wife....HOWEVER when purchasing it said these were female size 9, what was delivered was male size 9. So my wofe opened these up on Christmas and was thrilled....until she tried them on....going to send them back for a different size hopefully I get a refund. Other than that they are awesome, same quality as my howser slippers......
customer_reviews.author: Trophytruck

customer_reviews.title: Good house shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable if you wear with socks. If you are just looking for a slipper there are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haigh

customer_reviews.title: Best.Slippers.Evar
customer_reviews.text: I wear slippers around the house all day, since I work from home. These are the first slippers I've had that have stood up to that type of wear. They are super comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Darin

product_meta.title: KEEN Mens Howser II-M Howser (Wool)-m
product_meta.description: A sleeping bag for your feet. Bunched and quilted nylon fabric is lined with plush micro fleece to provide sleeping-bag-like warmth without the puffball bulk. Slim, comfortable and featuring accented stitching details, a natural rubber outsole and an El a st.
feature_bullets: Gore side panels for easy on and off
